com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.util

类 DBUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.util.DBUtility

  • public class DBUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to help LitePal with some database actions. These actions can help classes just do the jobs they care, and help them out of the trivial work.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTableNameByClassName

        public static java.lang.String getTableNameByClassName(java.lang.String className)
        Get the corresponding table name by the full class name with package. It will only get the short class name without package name as table name.
        参数:
        className - Full class name with package.
        返回:
        Return the table name by getting the short class name. Return null if the class name is null or invalid.

      • getTableNameListByClassNameList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTableNameListByClassNameList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> classNames)
        Get the corresponding table name list by the full class name list with package. Each table name will only get the short class name without package.
        参数:
        classNames - The list of full class name with package.
        返回:
        Return the table name list.

      • getTableNameByForeignColumn

        public static java.lang.String getTableNameByForeignColumn(java.lang.String foreignColumnName)
        Get table name by the given foreign column name.
        参数:
        foreignColumnName - The foreign column name. Standard pattern is tablename_id.
        返回:
        The table name. Return null if the given foreign column is null, empty or invalid.

      • getIntermediateTableName

        public static java.lang.String getIntermediateTableName(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                        java.lang.String associatedTableName)
        Create intermediate join table name by the concatenation of the two target table names in alphabetical order with underline in the middle.
        参数:
        tableName - First table name.
        associatedTableName - The associated table name.
        返回:
        The table name by the concatenation of the two target table names in alphabetical order with underline in the middle. If the table name or associated table name is null of empty, return null.

      • getGenericTableName

        public static java.lang.String getGenericTableName(java.lang.String className,
                                                   java.lang.String fieldName)
        Create generic table name by the concatenation of the class model's table name and simple generic type name with underline in the middle.
        参数:
        className - Name of the class model.
        fieldName - Name of the generic type field.
        返回:
        Table name by the concatenation of the class model's table name and simple generic type name with underline in the middle.

      • getGenericValueIdColumnName

        public static java.lang.String getGenericValueIdColumnName(java.lang.String className)
        The column name for referenced id in generic table.
        参数:
        className - Name of the class model.
        返回:
        The column name for referenced id in generic table.

      • isIntermediateTable

        public static boolean isIntermediateTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                                          android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Judge the table name is an intermediate table or not.
        参数:
        tableName - Table name in database.
        返回:
        Return true if the table name is an intermediate table. Otherwise return false.

      • isGenericTable

        public static boolean isGenericTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                                     android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Judge the table name is an generic table or not.
        参数:
        tableName - Table name in database.
        返回:
        Return true if the table name is an generic table. Otherwise return false.

      • isTableExists

        public static boolean isTableExists(java.lang.String tableName,
                                    android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Test if the table name passed in exists in the database. Cases are ignored.
        参数:
        tableName - The table name.
        返回:
        Return true if there's already a same name table exist, otherwise return false.

      • isColumnExists

        public static boolean isColumnExists(java.lang.String columnName,
                                     java.lang.String tableName,
                                     android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Test if a column exists in a table. Cases are ignored.
        参数:
        columnName - The column name.
        tableName - The table name.
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        返回:
        If there's a column named as the column name passed in, return true. Or return false. If any of the passed in parameters is null or empty, return false.

      • findAllTableNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> findAllTableNames(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Find all table names in the database. If there's some wrong happens when finding tables, it will throw exceptions.
        参数:
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        返回:
        A list with all table names.
        抛出:
        DatabaseGenerateException

      • findPragmaTableInfo

        public static TableModel findPragmaTableInfo(java.lang.String tableName,
                                             android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Look from the database to find a table named same as the table name in table model. Then iterate the columns and types of this table to create a new instance of table model. If there's no such a table in the database, then throw DatabaseGenerateException.
        参数:
        tableName - Table name.
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        返回:
        A table model object with values from database table.
        抛出:
        DatabaseGenerateException

      • findUniqueColumns

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> findUniqueColumns(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                 android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Find all unique column names of specified table.
        参数:
        tableName - The table to find unique columns.
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        返回:
        A list with all unique column names of specified table.

      • isFieldNameConflictWithSQLiteKeywords

        public static boolean isFieldNameConflictWithSQLiteKeywords(java.lang.String fieldName)
        If the field name is conflicted with SQLite keywords. Return true if conflicted, return false otherwise.
        参数:
        fieldName - Name of the field.
        返回:
        True if conflicted, false otherwise.

      • convertToValidColumnName

        public static java.lang.String convertToValidColumnName(java.lang.String columnName)
        Convert the passed in name to valid column name if the name is conflicted with SQLite keywords. The convert rule is to append KEYWORDS_COLUMN_SUFFIX to the name as new column name.
        参数:
        columnName - Original column name.
        返回:
        Converted name as new column name if conflicted with SQLite keywords.

      • convertWhereClauseToColumnName

        public static java.lang.String convertWhereClauseToColumnName(java.lang.String whereClause)
        Convert the where clause if it contains invalid column names which conflict with SQLite keywords.
        参数:
        whereClause - where clause for query, update or delete.
        返回:
        Converted where clause with valid column names.

      • convertSelectClauseToValidNames

        public static java.lang.String[] convertSelectClauseToValidNames(java.lang.String[] columns)
        Convert the select clause if it contains invalid column names which conflict with SQLite keywords.
        参数:
        columns - A String array of which columns to return. Passing null will return all columns.
        返回:
        Converted select clause with valid column names.

      • convertOrderByClauseToValidName

        public static java.lang.String convertOrderByClauseToValidName(java.lang.String orderBy)
        Convert the order by clause if it contains invalid column names which conflict with SQLite keywords.
        参数:
        orderBy - How to order the rows, formatted as an SQL ORDER BY clause. Passing null will use the default sort order, which may be unordered.
        返回:
        Converted order by clause with valid column names.
